title: Waistcoat, 1780–90
medium: Technique: Embroidery: satin, stem and knot stitches in fourteen colors on silk 7&1 satin foundation
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Gentleman's waistcoat with embroidered design of grape harvesting and wine casks.

tombstone.epitaph:
Waistcoat, 1780–90.
1780–90. Technique: Embroidery: satin, stem and knot stitches in fourteen colors on silk 7&1 satin foundation. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-54-48.
